ingredients.ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) containers fat-free cream cheese, softened
1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker pie crust

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature before beating to ensure a smooth, lump-free filling
Sift green tea powder into the filling to avoid clumps and distribute flavor evenly
Bake at a lower temperature (325°F) and watch for a slight jiggle in the center when done to prevent cracks
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Remind the user that using fat-free cream cheese makes this lighter; full-fat will make it richer. Baking instructions matter—don't overbake.
